**Basal Ganglia Loops**

| Loop              | Cortical Involvement                                                                    | Striatal Component                        | Pallidal Component                                                                  | Thalamic Component                      |
| :---------------- | :-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | :---------------------------------------- | :---------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | :-------------------------------------- |
| **Body Movement** | Primary motor cortex, Premotor cortex, Supplementary motor cortex, Somatosensory cortex | Putamen                                   | Lateral globus pallidus, Internal segment                                           | Ventral lateral nucleus, Ventral anterior nucleus |
| **Prefrontal**    | Dorsolateral prefrontal cortex                                                          | Anterior caudate                          | Globus pallidus, Internal segment; Substantia nigra pars reticulata               | Mediodorsal nucleus, Ventral anterior nucleus    |
| **Limbic**        | Anterior cingulate cortex, Orbitofrontal cortex, Amygdala, Hippocampus, Temporal cortex | Ventral striatum (nucleus accumbens)      | Ventral pallidum                                                                    | Mediodorsal nucleus                     |
